title: How are people complaing about lb, kalista, and ekko when this guy exists...
body:
I'm sorry, but if you main fizz... i have 0 respect for u
like, none
What doesnt this guy have?? 0.65 AP RATIO ON AUTOS WHILE E IS ACTIVE??? 1.0 AP RATIO + DMG BOOST WITH ULTI?  TANKINESS?? 
Straight up, i dare u to name one of fizz's weaknesses
compare his ratios to tf:  if tf lands his qw and gets e proc, he deals 1.65 ap damage
If fizz lands his full combo and uses 2 autos, he will do nearly 3.0 ap ratio... + cc, DOTs, gap closer, and this is without lichbane!
add in his complete lack of counterplay if he can land his "skillshot" ulti...

replies.body: Why are you comparing a melee assassin with a ranged utility mage with a near global presence?

Because the existence of one badly designed champion doesn't excuse the existence of others.

People complain about those other champions because they are picked much more often.  You don't see Fizz much, so people have somewhat forgotten how little counterplay his low-cooldown untargetability has.

It's funny to say he was somewhat forgotten since he is quite often pick in the E-sports scene. But I can see how that may not count since the pros often build him as a tank rather then displaying the nightmare of a full AP Fizz.

I feel that AD bruiser / tanky Fizz is much less frustrating to play against because he doesn't deal massive burst damage before instantly becoming untargetable.  At least you have time to do something against a bruiser Fizz before you are deleted.

lol that's not what the bronzes/silvers on this board said.

They said AD/tank Fizz was cancer and more OP than AP Fizz.

Lol ok.

Have fun getting deleted if you misposition, with the definition of misposition being anywhere not touching a tank or support, or getting 100-0'ed as full tank thanks to missing %HP damage.

I don't know, just from my own personal experience I found him much less frustrating because it took him much longer to apply his damage unless he was really fed.

But I don't play top very much, so I don't really know what he's like to lane against when he's playing AD-tanky up there.  I was only talking about in general from the perspective of the jungler or other lanes.
Fizz is laughably easy to lane against at top. He has no poke, no sustain, and can only all-in. But he also uses mana. Why would you pick Fizz over Riven or Fiora?

Remember the old Fizz before the AP and AD nerfs.

Just get level 3, blow up the enemy team with nothing but a Flask.
you forgot his high burst dmg

He has a terrible laning phase with super high mana costs on E? Other than that i agree, he can snowball super hard and is obnoxious as f if someone is semi competent at Fizz. Personally i think Riven is way more broken.

Weakness? PFFFF. FIZZ'S WEAKNESSES ARE LIKE ORIGINAL JOKES.  They don't exist.  The only time I've EVER killed a Fizz consistently is....you probably guessed it.  He dashed into Heimerdinger's damage dorito.

meh i kill fizz with zed pretty easily. Just dodge or qss the shark, or just build a hex drinker. His melle means nothing to a zed cuz you will win in a melle fight anyway. As long as you play with the fact that he has a high burst in mind and counter build/ counter champ play its fine. Never had a problem with him unless another lane feeds him to high hell. But anyones op if fed. - on a side note i dont know if qss still works on the shark i havnt played that match up in a good while- but i know the shield from a hexdrinker still works wonders

I used to play her.
It's because she counters the tank meta so hard.  If we were back in an assassin meta where people could kill her with one gap closer people wouldn't think she was OP.

It's not even "tank-meta"; she was around before that and people still had relevant issues with her.  And it's not just with the passive but with the fact that all of her abilities are just copies of other champions, except better because CTD.

He's single target melee. Mostly single target at any rate.

Theres tons of single target melee champs with crushingly powerful stuff in their kits. But the fact is they have to put themselves in harm's way to do anything, and even they only do anything to one target. And they're sooo vulnerable to AoE and CC while they do it, and have to itemize offense and defense.

Fizz is easily my least favorite champion. Its damn near impossible to cc him, and with the recent changes he can be built as a burst tank who is, wait for it, impossible to cc. Lets face it, his e makes him difficult to play against. Zhonyas doesnt help when hes building ap. And when hes a tank I hate seeing qss and/or banshees veil on him. 

I understand he has a high skill cap, but that doesnt mean he should have such a high reward... You have to use a stun to mess him up, but if you dont kill him fast enough its useless. Maybe a higher cd on his e, and slightly lower scaling, nothing too big.

I'll never understand how fizz's E makes him un targetable, If im playing caitlyn, and i see him jump onto his poll, how the hell am i not able to put a bullet in his ass hen he's just sitting there? it's not like he's moving or anything

Fizz got the absolute shit nerfed out of him, and now people are finding a way to play him again.

Its what we call "The cycle of Kha'Zix"

Fizz is horrible to deal with against mid lane mages (Lux, Veigar, Swain, TF, Syndra, ETC..) They all have that one crucial skill that they must land before comboing and Fizz can just go untargetable, jump twice, land on them, and do tons of damage. Once his troll pole is down (If Fizz takes Morrello and CDR boots, you need to pray cause that ability will never go off cooldown) you should engage.
He is similar to Ekko in my opinion. They both have the untargetable thing....except...Fizz doesn't heal...nor does he stun or shield himself.....Hmm..
Fizz needs some changes...but I would rather the one now...before the season 4 one

"skillshot" being a relative term considering it has a large area of effect sticky bomb

but I believe the answer to this dilemma is to buff TWISTED FATE  !  XD

at max cooldown reduction, he gets what other mages consider "normal" cooldowns on his most powerful ability and only offensive spell


sure, he can nuke a team pretty hard if he actually gets to hit them uninterrupted, but it feels so nasty when people can just walk up and steal your kill because your entire offense is on cooldown or you have to be in auto range as a mage, something not that fun to do unless you KNOW there is only one opponent

as it stands at the moment, some champions can push TF out of lane 100% of the time, he can't support,  I don't even want to attempt learning to jungle with him because that should never happen,  his ADC days are behind him.  His pick a card doesn't even reset his auto attack XD  as most other on-hit effects would


he's also one of the only mages that has trouble against every type of matchup...most melee and tank characters are too touch for him to wittle down before they get in range

It's probably only a matter of time that Riot gets to Fizz. He sees a lot of play in both the mega tank as well as full ap build. And then you see on Bjergsen's stream that IWD misses every fish and still solo kills his opponent.

Fizz just needs to be reworked, after multiple hard nerfs he's still one of the most overpowered, and annoying champions in the game to play. No, he doesn't have a high skill base either. His one actual skillshot his ult, hit's for itself and it's harder to miss it than to hit it.
Fizz's weakness? He has no poke.
ap fizz is never going to be truly 'balanced'

Fizz's weakness is that the sheer power of playing Fizz makes you so cocky that sometimes you'll see something coming at you and just forget to press E because you're pretty sure you're invulnerable all the time.

I tried playing fizz yesterday, and that ult... FUCK THAT ULT.

Out of like, 25 ults, I landed a grand total of... 2 or 3. I really don't want to play fizz again just because I can't land one lousy skillshot.

He doesn't have tankiness. He has the ability to dodge dmg altogether.

I do despise the fact that new Fizz can still wreck a squishy with ease if he builds bruiser - awful design imo, at least old Fizz needed to build full dmg - but that doesn't make champs like Ekko balanced.
